Posts.Content: I took tamoxifen for 5 years and had no side effects.
Posts.Title: If you are on tamoxifen.....

Posts.Content: They usually do another mammo first, then an ultrasound if necessary. The biopsy, if necessary, can be done in the hospital as an outpatient. But, since you are not being called back for another mammo or ultrasound, I wouldn't be too worried.
Posts.Title: Help Please - what might happen next?
